xierpa3.sites.examples.featuredcolumn package¶

Submodules¶

xierpa3.sites.examples.featuredcolumn.make module¶

class xierpa3.sites.examples.featuredcolumn.make.FeaturedColumn(components=None, style=None, id=None, parent=None, name=None, css=None, fonts=None, prefix=None, class_=None, type=None, contentID=None, repeat=1, title=None, url=None, template=None, editable=False, adapter=None, selector=None, **kwargs)¶

Bases: xierpa3.components.theme.Theme

The FeaturedColumn generates overview test on the featuring components.

C¶

alias of Constants

TITLE = u'Featured column.'¶
URL_FONTS = ['//cloud.webtype.com/css/7aa22aa1-1709-4b55-b95c-3413d3e5280a.css']¶
baseComponents()¶

Create a theme site with just one single template home page. Answer a list of page instances that are used as templates for this site.

baseStyle()¶

Answer the single basis style that will be defined as overall CSS, before specific block definitions start.

make(root=None)¶

The instance of this class builds CSS and HTML files at the optional path <b>root</b>. If not defined, then the default ~/Desktop/Xierpa3Examples/[component.name] is used as export path, as set by Builder.DEFAULT_ROOTPATH
